law.catch_line: Effect of failure to pay for or rent school supplies.
law.text: No child shall be denied full participation in any educational program due to an inability to pay for, or rent, necessary school supplies, including textbooks.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 200, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 462, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 1, effective February 26, 1982.
